Sentencas: Fuel cells allow generation of electric energy in a clean and efficient way.
Titulo: The effect of nickel oxide on the sintering of nanoparticles of samarium doped cerium oxide (SDC) for application in fuel cells

Sentencas: Among the different types of fuel cells, solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) stands out.
Titulo: The effect of nickel oxide on the sintering of nanoparticles of samarium doped cerium oxide (SDC) for application in fuel cells

Sentencas: Samarium doped cerium oxide (SDC) have been widely studied for its application as solid electrolyte and as a component of cermet type anode.
Titulo: The effect of nickel oxide on the sintering of nanoparticles of samarium doped cerium oxide (SDC) for application in fuel cells

Sentencas: Initially, this work describes synthesis of nanoparticles of 20% mol samarium doped cerium oxide (Ce0,8Sm0,2O1,9), by the precursor method.
Titulo: The effect of nickel oxide on the sintering of nanoparticles of samarium doped cerium oxide (SDC) for application in fuel cells

Sentencas: Subsequently, we analyze the effect of nickel oxide (NiO) and 10% cobalt-doped nickel oxide (CoNiO) on the sintering at 1200 degrees C of SDC pellets, aiming to attaining a sintering degree higher than 90%.
Titulo: The effect of nickel oxide on the sintering of nanoparticles of samarium doped cerium oxide (SDC) for application in fuel cells

Sentencas: Materials were characterized by X-ray Diffraction (XRD), Infrared Spectroscopy (IR), Thermal Analysis (TG/ DTA), Transmition Electron Microscopy (TEM) and Raman Spectroscopy.
Titulo: The effect of nickel oxide on the sintering of nanoparticles of samarium doped cerium oxide (SDC) for application in fuel cells

Sentencas: We observed an increase in percentage of sintering from 83.1% (pure SDC pellet) to 98.6% (SDC pellet with CoNiO).
Titulo: The effect of nickel oxide on the sintering of nanoparticles of samarium doped cerium oxide (SDC) for application in fuel cells

Sentencas: Therefore, SDC prepared by the precursor method allows obtaining pellets with high density, which is a prerequisite for their use in preparation of components of SOFC type fuel cells.
Titulo: The effect of nickel oxide on the sintering of nanoparticles of samarium doped cerium oxide (SDC) for application in fuel cells
